title: Helvetica Neue Font Family Download for Desktop & WebFont | CDNFonts.com
text: Helvetica Neue “Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless.” Mother Teresa “Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless.” Mother Teresa To embed your selected fonts into a webpage, copy this code into the head of your HTML document. <link href="https://fonts.cdnfonts.com/css/helvetica-neue-5" rel="stylesheet"> <style> @import url('https://fonts.cdnfonts.com/css/helvetica-neue-5'); </style> Use the following CSS rules to specify these families font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; Helvetica Neue with support for a wider range of foreign languages.
